meanings.definition: The capacity to be trained or taught.
meanings.sent1: Her trainability made her a quick learner in the new job.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's trainability impressed the obedience trainer.
meanings.sent3: The robot's trainability was so high that it learned to do chores around the house!
meanings.sent4: His trainability was like a sponge, absorbing new information effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The trainability of the students was evident in their rapid progress.

meanings.definition: The quality of being easily trained or taught.
meanings.sent1: The trainability of the software allowed even beginners to use it effectively.
meanings.sent2: The dolphin's trainability made it a star performer at the aquarium.
meanings.sent3: The trainability of the parrot was so high that it learned to mimic the phone ringing!
meanings.sent4: Her trainability shone through as she quickly adapted to the new dance routine.
meanings.sent5: The trainability of the team members was crucial for the project's success.
